name: BondHome
0:
”Alexa, Turn on My Fan”
”Alexa, Turn on My Fan Light”
”Alexa, Set My Fan speed to 1”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Bond Home is the leading platform for smart ceiling fans, plus a growing number of other appliances. Bond Home supports all Smart by Bond ceiling fans, and supports (almost) any remote-controlled ceiling fan via the Bond Bridge (BD-1000). NOTE: Support for the Bond Bridge in this app is currently in beta. Please continue to use the Bond Legacy integration with your Bond Bridge (BD-1000).
Before using this integration, you must have already set up a Bond account using the Bond Home app, available for Android and iOS.
